content:
for the single-color version of this doily see irish crochet doily #7575 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/irish-crochet-doily-7575
**materials ** j & p coats or clark s o n t best six cord mercerized crochet size 30 *small ball* * white 3 balls j & p coats or 5 balls clark s o n t * shaded pinks 2 balls coats or 3 balls o n t * shaded greens 2 balls coats or 3 balls o n t * steel crochet hook no 10
